comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for a checkbox that controls access to feedback and support features. It appears in a UI component where users can toggle this setting, allowing them to enable or disable these features.

usage.context:
<div className="branding-checkbox">
 <Checkbox
 data-testid="show-feedback-support"
 className="show-feedback-support checkbox"
 isDisabled={!isSettingPaid}
 label={t("ShowFeedbackAndSupport")}
 isChecked={feedbackEnabled}
 onChange={() => setFeedbackEnabled(!feedbackEnabled)}
 />
 
 <Checkbox

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Покажете линка за Обратна връзка и Поддръжка' is a bit literal and doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Show the Feedback & Support link.' A more natural Bulgarian phrasing would be 'Показване на връзката Обратна връзка и Поддръжка' or 'Виж връзката Обратна връзка и Поддръжка'. The 'Покажете' (Show) implies an action that is less appropriate for a menu item or link label.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Виж връзката Обратна връзка и Поддръжка

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation uses a colon (:) which is not present in the English source. It's better to keep the translation consistent without it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zpětná vazba a podpora

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Εμφάνιση του συνδέσμου σχολίων και υποστήριξης' is a bit too literal. A more natural Greek phrasing for 'Show the Feedback & Support link' would be something like 'Προβολή συνδέσμου σχολίων και υποστήριξης' or 'Εμφάνιση συνδέσμου για σχόλια και υποστήριξη'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Προβολή συνδέσμου σχολίων και υποστήριξης

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The ampersand (&) in the English content is translated as 'ja' in Finnish, which is more natural. Using '&' directly can feel abrupt.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Näytä palaute ja tukilinkki

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Feedback' is directly translated to 'Feedback'. While understandable, it would be more natural to use a French equivalent like 'Commentaires'. 'Assistance' is a good translation for 'Support'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Afficher le lien Commentaires et assistance

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The '&' symbol is not typically used in French. It's better to use 'et'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Afficher le lien Commentaires et assistance

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ցույց տալ «Հետադարձ կապ և Աջակցություն» հղումը" is a literal translation and a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ցուցադրել «Հետադարձ կապ և Աջակցություն» հղումը

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Mostra link a Feedback e Supporto' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Show the Feedback & Support link'.  'a' is unnecessary and awkward. 'Feedback e Supporto' should ideally be 'Feedback e Assistenza' for greater cultural appropriateness and clarity in Italian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostra il link a Feedback e Assistenza

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The article 'il' is missing before 'link'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostra il link a Feedback e Assistenza

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '피드백 & 지원 링크 표시' is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Korean. It's too direct and sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like '피드백 및 지원 링크 보기' or '피드백/지원 링크 표시' depending on the desired level of formality.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of '&' might not be the best choice for Korean. It's unusual and can look unprofessional. While acceptable, consider replacing it with '및' (and) or '/' (slash).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace '&' with '및' or '/'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Rādīt atsauksmju un atbalsta saiti' is a literal translation but sounds slightly unnatural in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Parādīt Atgriezeniskums un Atbalsts' or 'Parādīt palīdzības un atgriezeniskuma saiti'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Parādīt palīdzības un atgriezeniskuma saiti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Pokaż link do sekcji Opinii i wsparcia' is a bit too literal. While technically correct, it's not the most natural way to express 'Show the Feedback & Support link' in Polish. A more common and user-friendly phrasing would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokaż link 'Opinie i wsparcie' or Po prostu 'Opinie i wsparcie'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Mostre a link Feedback & Support' is not a natural or accurate translation of 'Show the Feedback & Support link'. 'link' is in English and should be translated to Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostre o link Feedback & Suporte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English text includes '&' which should be translated if a Portuguese equivalent exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostre o link Feedback e Suporte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The ampersand (&) in the English content is not consistently translated into a Portuguese equivalent. 'Feedback & Support' is translated literally as 'Feedback & Suporte'. A more natural Portuguese equivalent would be 'Feedback e Suporte'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mostrar o link Feedback e Suporte

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Afişare linkul de feedback şi asistenţă' isn't the most natural or idiomatic way to say 'Show the Feedback & Support link' in Romanian. 'Afişare' is a bit formal and direct. A more user-friendly option would focus on the action of displaying or showing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Vizualizare linkul Feedback & Asistență' or 'Arată linkul Feedback & Asistență'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'Feedback & Asistență' instead of 'Feedback și Asistență' aligns better with English naming conventions for technical terms, especially when localized.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'Feedback & Asistență'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ සහ සහයෝගිතා අභිසන්ධිය පෙන්වන්න' is too literal and lengthy. 'අභිසන්ධිය' means 'link' but makes the sentence overly formal for a UI setting. A more natural translation would be something like 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහයෝගිතා සබැඳිය පෙන්වන්න' or simply 'ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහයෝගිතා පෙන්වන්න'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ හා සහයෝගිතා පෙන්වන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'හා' instead of '&' is stylistically different from the English content's use of '&'. While 'හා' is perfectly acceptable Sinhala, maintaining consistency with the English source is often preferred in UI translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ප්‍රතිපෝෂණ සහ සහයෝගිතා පෙන්වන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Pokaži povezavo Povratne informacije in podpora" is not a precise translation of 'Show the Feedback & Support link'. While understandable, it's somewhat literal and less natural. A better translation would more closely represent the action of displaying a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokaži povezavo do Povratnih informacij in Podpore

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'in' to join 'Povratne informacije' and 'Podpora' is acceptable but a more formal or cleaner option might be preferred in some contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pokaži povezavo Povratnih informacij in Podpore (no change needed, stylistic preference)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation "Прикажи линк за повратне информације и подршку" is a literal translation but sounds unnatural. A more idiomatic translation would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Покажи линк за повратне информације и подршку

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Прикажи' isn't technically incorrect, 'Покажи' feels more natural and aligned with typical UI/UX phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Покажи линк за повратне информације и подршку

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Prikaži link za povratne informacije i podršku' is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be 'Prikaži vezu za povratne informacije i podršku' or 'Prikaži odeljak za povratne informacije i podršku'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Prikaži vezu za povratne informacije i podršku
